inclusion.criterion: medical student, resident, fellow, or attending in Surgery, Urology, or Obstetrics-Gynecology at Washington University School of Medicine
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: laparoscopic cases and <50 robotic cases as primary surgeon or first assistant surgeon during one's career
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: known severe skin sensitivities or allergies to adhesives
exclusion.label: met

notes: The patient is a 41-year-old man with Acromegaly who underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago. He has no known severe skin sensitivities or allergies to adhesives.
